title: I dreamed that I was studying at school

preview.html: I dreamed that I was studying at school. Teaching is one of the best and most important jobs. The teacher is the basis of the development of societies. The more education is reformed in a country, the more advanced it is. Proper education produces a doctor, an engineer, an accountant, and a craftsman. There is no renewal of society without education, and care is one of the most important things. With teaching, the dream has many connections and interpretations that we will explain through this article, so follow us. I dreamed that I was teaching in school, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees himself in a dream knows that he has a realized personality. He has many good qualities and the ability to take responsibility, help others, and loyalty. Seeing teaching Islamic sciences and the Holy Qur’an in a dream is a sign of guidance, justice, and wealth. As is evident from seeing education in a dream, the dreamer’s love for knowledge, learning, and gaining experiences from life. The educational vision indicates that a single young man is approaching his marriage. Seeing a teacher in a dream for a married man is evidence of his ability to carry out the responsibilities assigned to him. To him.Dreaming of entering a school that the dreamer does not know.A sign of new experiences in his life.I dreamed that I was studying in a school for singles.Seeing a girl studying in a dream indicates a promotion in her job or success in her career.Seeing a girl is a school for singles is a sign that he thinks a lot about the future and worries about it.Seeing them go To school for single people: It indicates her attempt to make serious changes and progress in her life. Going back in time with the girl and seeing her wearing school clothes and a school bag in a dream refers to the pressures she is receiving in her life. Seeing an exam paper in a dream for a girl indicates the approaching marriage contract. Interpretation of seeing teaching in a dream for a woman Married Woman: Seeing a school in a dream for a married woman indicates her good and successful relationships with her own social context. Seeing a teacher in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability and understanding that surrounds her relationship with her husband in reality. If a married woman sees in a dream that she has been expelled from school, this indicates the problems and difficulties that she will face or She leaves her job if she or her husband is working. Interpretation of seeing teaching in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing teaching in a dream for a pregnant woman is an indication that her birth is approaching and that she will be healthy. Seeing the same pregnant woman at school presentations is an indication that she is worried and even afraid of pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing teaching in a dream for a man. Vision The same man teaching a group of students indicates that he has reached a high position. Seeing a man leaving school indicates disagreements and problems between him and his wife or mother. Seeing a man transformed like a child and learning in school indicates his many worries and sorrows and his inability to endure. If someone sees that he did not pass the educational tests, It is an indication of a wrong path followed by caution and reviewing one’s affairs. The vision of teaching in a man’s dream indicates cunning, intelligence, and his ability to bear responsibility and succeed in his work. Dear visitors to the Vision website, in case there is any problem or inquiry about it, the interpretation of the educational vision “A”

preview.html: Through our topic today, we will explain to you many of the interpretive issues related to the dream of drowning, and what is the difference between drowning in the sea or in the river, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing drowning in a dream for a single girl: Seeing one person drowning in a dream indicates many different meanings and connotations. Surviving drowning. Or swimming and resisting drowning also has meaning and interpretation: Contemporary dream interpreters say that drowning in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that the dreamer is in a failed emotional relationship full of transgressions that drain her energy and emotions to no avail. As for ancient interpreters, they say that drowning in an unmarried woman’s dream is A sign of attachment to this world, love of money, lack of interest in religion, concern for the afterlife, and working even a little for it. Drowning in a dream of a monastery could be a sign of the many pressures she is exposed to, starting from the injustice of her family through her customs and traditions of society and her sense of sadness and remorse, Because she misses someone who sympathizes with her and stands by her. Drowning in the sea with rising waves is a sign that she will be exposed to a harsh experience in her life. Surviving drowning in a dream is a good omen for repentance, justice, and the end of the ordeal, God willing. To see yourself swimming in one dream means that you are struggling in This world is for self-realization and not relying on anyone. It was also said that swimming symbolizes difficulty and lack of opportunities for marriage, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about surviving drowning in a river. Interpretation of seeing yourself drowning in a dream for a married woman. Seeing yourself drowning in a married woman’s dream represents an obsession with fashion And makeup. Neglecting the wife and children for the sake of adornment and attracting people’s attention. To see yourself drowning in murky water or water means disappearing. And lying and deceiving people by lying for the sake of gain. To see a married woman swimming to the beach shows the work she is doing to help her husband with household expenses. And the requirements of children, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing yourself drowning in a dream about a man and its meaning. If you see a man drowning in a dream, this means that the water is calm and clear. About the temptations of the world, love of desires, and the pursuit of sins and forbidden things. Swimming in a raging sea is a bad scene. It warns of calamities and bad deeds will happen. We ask God Almighty to save him from it. He was able to swim and survive drowning in a dream. It is a good repentance and closer to the Lord of the Worlds, and good circumstances, God willing. The meaning of seeing a pregnant woman drowning in a dream and its interpretationSeeing her drowning in the dreamer’s dream means that her fetus is not well. He must consult a doctor and constantly monitor and control his condition. It is said that drowning in fresh water in a dream is a sign of imminent birth. Swimming in the river portends a natural birth, God willing. Seeing swimming in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates her home and family, and her desire to meet their needs and make them happy in all possible ways. Read also: Interpretation of surviving drowning in a dream for a divorced woman. Interpretation of seeing yourself drowning in a dream for young men and its meaning. When a young man sees in his sleep as if he is drowning in the sea. This is evidence of his attachment to the world and his desire to collect money.

title: The meaning of dreaming about dirt in a dream

preview.html: Seeing dirt in a dream means money and wealth, and as for collecting dirt in a dream, this indicates collecting money. Whoever sees that he has a pile of dirt, this indicates money in the amount of dirt. Throwing dirt in a dream can mean waste, and the following is the interpretation of the meaning of dreaming about dirt in a dream according to Al-Osaimi in detail. The meaning of a dream about dirt in a dream Al-Osaimi. Seeing dirt in a dream can herald goodness and make money. Seeing dirt can indicate the presence of problems and anxiety for the same dreamer. Interpretation of seeing dirt in the house: If a person sees in his dream that he is walking on the dirt, this indicates kindness and collecting money without effort and fatigue. But if he sees that he is collecting dirt in the corners of the house, this indicates that the dreamer is suffering from problems and worries. Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream: If he sees that He cleans clothes from the dirt that covers them, as this indicates frequent quarrels. However, if a man sees his clothes clean of dirt, this indicates that there are problems between him and his wife that lead to divorce. It also indicates his illness and lack of money. Interpretation of a vision of collecting money from dirt, but if the dreamer sees In a dream, he collects dust, this indicates expanded nutrition and the emergence of joy. But if the dreamer sees that he collects paper money, this indicates that the dreamer lives according to the will of God. If the dreamer sees that he collects money from dirt, this indicates wealth. But if he sees that The money is lost after collecting it, so this indicates bad news of a person’s death. Interpretation of seeing yourself walking in a dream: Seeing yourself walking in a dream, this indicates that he is diligent in his opinion about collecting money in a dream. But if he sees in his dream that he is walking on dirt, this indicates that he will obtain Money. And if he sees that he took dirt and carried it in a dream, this indicates that he will have a source of livelihood that will be his share. Interpretation of eating dirt in a dream Seeing eating dirt in a dream indicates separation and pain, and it also indicates separation from those we love. But if he sees himself He eats dirt in a dream, this indicates the death of someone he loved very much. Interpretation of seeing red dirt in a dream But if one sees red dirt in a dream, this indicates happiness in life and happiness in diet. If he sees dirt soft, this indicates a lot of profit And making a lot of money. Interpretation of the appearance of dirt on clothes: If a person or student sees dirt on his clothes in a dream, this indicates his near success. As for whoever sees dirt on his clothes in a dream, this indicates that God provides him with everything He wants, whether it is money or children. Or success. Interpretation of seeing wet dirt in a dream. But if he sees wet dirt in his dream, this indicates that he will enter into a new project. If a married couple sees wet soil in a dream, this indicates fertility and procreation. But if he sees wet soil in his dream, and he suffers from Boredom in his life, this indicates breaking the boredom and renewing his life. But if he sees wet dirt and gets sick, this indicates recovery. Interpretation of seeing dirt on the face in a dream, but if he sees that dust is everywhere on

title: Interpretation of seeing visitors in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing visitors through the site. Seeing the site roy2a.com. Guests are people who come as guests to the house and the owners of the house do their duty, so honoring the guest and treating him well is part of the generosity of morals that all heavenly religions practice, and when. Seeing visitors in a dream, the fortuneteller asks about its meaning. And he is looking for him, and today we will explain the most important interpretations of the great dream interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing visitors in a dream Seeing guests of honor in a dream indicates a man’s cooperation with his family, his love for them, and good treatment. Seeing a strange visitor in a dream indicates that offering food It indicates that the dreamer should feed the poor and needy. Seeing visitors in the house indicates that they are happy. This house is a house of generosity, joy and happiness soon for them. Seeing foreign guests hosted by the dreamer and he is honored and loved by them, because it is a sign of the dreamer’s death for the sake of God. Seeing a sudden visitor In a dream about paying off debts and almost absolving the forerunner. Seeing visitors with gifts to the fortuneteller. The fortuneteller testifies to a sign of livelihood and wide benefits. Not honoring guests in a dream and neglecting them indicates duties that the dreamer does not perform. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing guests being fed in a dream Interpretation of seeing visitors in a dream Ibn Sirin says Ibn Sirin said that seeing a visitor in a dream is that a traveler will return or travel soon is an indicator. Seeing a group of guests in a dream is an indicator that he honors them in meeting the dreamer for good deeds and doing what benefits people. Seeing a guest sponsoring food and drink indicates everything they need is a sign that the god will become a power and a position. On these people. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing cousins ​​in a dream. Interpretation of seeing visitors in a dream for a single woman. Seeing good guests in one dream. Sign her upcoming engagement and she will be happy with that. As for unwanted guests in one dream? An indication of a sermon that she does not want. Seeing a guest A family coming in a single woman’s dream is an indication of his proposal to her. Seeing a sudden visitor in a person’s dream indicates that she will receive happy news and a change in her life for the better. Seeing a guest being expelled in a single woman’s dream is an indication of the groom’s rejection or an indication that he has committed a wrong act that causes him sadness. Offers to see guests They eat food in the girl’s house as long as her house is a good house and food accompanies them. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing food distributed in a dream. Interpretation of seeing visitors in a dream for a married woman. Seeing guests of honor in a married woman’s dream refers to the sustenance, kindness, and blessing she enjoys in her home, her husband, and her household. Seeing a strange visitor In the dream of a married woman, it is a reference to a harbinger of an imminent pregnancy. If a married woman sees that she is embarrassed in front of guests, it is a sign of the financial difficulties that she will go through or that she is trying hard to raise her children. Interpretation of seeing visitors in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a strange visitor in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign that her fetus will be male. Seeing a guest also indicates the presence of a woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the legs

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing leg hair removed in a dream or a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing leg hair removed in a dream has many connotations that can lead to good or portend bad, and the interpreters differed in their interpretation of seeing and removing leg hair. Hair in a dream depends on the person’s condition. Interpretation of seeing leg hair removed in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of removing leg hair in a dream: Seeing hair removed from the leg or arm in a dream indicates obtaining goodness and benefit. And benefit from something in the coming period. Seeing hair removed from a leg or arm in a dream indicates a significant improvement in her financial affairs and the settlement of her debts if she has debts. Seeing hair removed from a leg or arm in a dream indicates the release of anxiety, the release of anxiety, and the emergence of sustenance and comfort. Approximately. See also: Interpretation of seeing armpit hair removed in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a man removing leg hair in a dream: Seeing a man with long or thick leg hair in a dream indicates crises that he will face or indicates bad company that will harm him. Seeing a man removing his leg hair in a dream indicates Getting rid of the problems he faces and the difficulties he faces on his way. Seeing a man removing his body hair in general indicates the profits and gains that he will achieve from a project or trade he undertakes. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair removed from the face in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about removing hair on the legs for a single woman? Seeing women alone with thick leg hair in a dream indicates the many problems and crises they face in their lives. Seeing a single woman removing her leg hair in a dream indicates getting rid of every problem she was preoccupied with, and the end of every sadness she felt. Seeing a single woman removing her leg hair in a dream indicates Until her marriage to a respectable and religious person approaches, she will be very happy with him. Seeing a single woman removing all her leg hair in a dream indicates the emergence of positive changes in her life and achieving success for her, whether in her academic or professional life. Seeing an unmarried woman removing all her body hair in a dream indicates Important opportunities that she will miss in her life, and which she will hardly make up for. See also: Interpretation of seeing a hairstyle in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a woman removing her leg hair in a dream: Seeing a married woman removing all of her body hair in a dream. It indicates what prevails in the house of kindness, livelihood, and many good things. Seeing A married woman’s body hair in a dream announces her imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman removing her leg hair with razors in a dream indicates a change for the better in her life and in the life of her family. Seeing a married woman removing her leg hair in a dream indicates stability, happiness, and the good relationship she enjoys in her life with Her husband. Seeing a married woman removing her leg hair in a dream may indicate a financial crisis that she will be exposed to. Seeing a married woman having someone else remove her leg hair indicates her inability to cope.

title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about laughter in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about laughter in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing laughter in a dream as evidence of joy and happiness, especially if it was without laughter. And seeing laughter loudly reaching the point of falling to the ground is a dream that is contrary to reality, as it expresses sadness, sorrow, and intense crying. Al-Nabulsi said Seeing laughter is due to ridicule or ridicule, as this is evidence of the dreamer’s lack of modesty and that he is a person who jokes a lot in reality. Seeing laughter as a result of imitation or imitation is evidence of falling into forbidden things and prohibitions. A single person who sees in a dream that he is laughing quietly without laughing, this is evidence of It is close to marriage. A pregnant woman who sees in a dream that she is laughing quietly without laughing, then this dream is evidence that the newborn is a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a smile in a dream. And whoever sees in a dream that he is smiling a light and quiet smile, this is evidence of the goodness of religion and the world. And whoever sees the earth If you laugh in a dream, this is evidence of the fertility of that place. And if a dead person laughs or smiles in a dream, then this dream deserves praise for the Manufi, and is evidence that he will reside in the abode of bliss in the afterlife. The sultan or one of prestige who sees in a dream that he is laughing lightly or trivially in the dream, This dream does not praise the monarch, as this is evidence of the loss of his grace, kingdom, and authority. Interpretation of laughter for an unmarried single woman who sees in a dream that she is laughing, then this dream is a good omen for the dreamer, evidence of joy and happiness, especially if it is without laughter or sarcasm and ridicule, and laughter in a dream for a single woman. People can be a sign of close marriage. Whoever sees in a dream that she is laughing as a result of mockery of a poor man, a beggar, or an old man, then this is evidence of the weakness of her faith and her distance from the teachings of religion. Laughter in a person’s dream is good and a sign of joy and happiness, especially if he is humble and generous or if The laughter was in a place that allows laughter, such as a theater. And we see laughing with friends or a group of relatives, this dream is evidence of the joy that will overwhelm the dreamer’s companions in the future. Laughter in a single woman’s dream can be evidence that she lives a stable life and enjoys balance in her personality, and it can be A sign of a negative charge that is about to disappear. Interpretation of seeing laughter in a married woman’s dream: A married woman who sees in a dream that she is laughing quietly, then this dream is good and happy skin for the dreamer. And whoever sees in a dream that she is laughing humbly, away from people’s eyes, this is good news that God will provide for her. Two good sons. In general, quiet laughter in a married woman’s dream is a sign of pregnancy, a child, nourishment, happiness and joy. And whoever sees herself laughing in the mosque or prayer room, this dream is not praiseworthy. If she sees that she is laughing with the husband or father, then this dream is not good. Interpretation Seeing laughter in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman who sees in a dream that her husband is laughing and smiling until his teeth appear, then this dream is a sign of happiness, happiness, and the fulfillment of desires. The laughter of a pregnant woman is evidence of the approaching date of birth. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing laughter in a dream

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a white horse in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a white horse in a dream: Seeing a horse is considered one of the visions that carries many interpretations, and this vision varies based on many considerations, including the color of the horse. It may be white or black, the horse may be angry or friendly, and you may find the horse has wings and flies in the sky, etc. What is important to us in this article is that we mention all the indicators and cases of a dream about a white horse. What is the interpretation of a dream about a white horse in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq? Interpretation of a dream about a white horse: Seeing a horse expresses the glory, honor, and prestige that a man acquires through his work, toil, and good behavior among people. If the fortuneteller sees a horse in his dream, this is a sign of high status, the end of many problems, the collapse of worries and sorrows, and the ability to overcome them and not stop there. As far as the interpretation of a dream about a white horse is concerned, this vision indicates sustenance, blessings, abundance, goodness, and progress according to previous planning and control. In all the consequences that can be reaped if forced to follow a certain path. The interpretation of a dream about a white horse could be an indication of participating in a profitable project or trade that brings many benefits and benefits to the individual, or the presence of a partnership in the near future. And if one sees that he is riding a white horse This indicates life transitions and important changes that occur in his life and take him to the situation he is looking for. And whoever is inclined toward the state, this vision is an indication of achieving sovereignty and leadership and achieving the desired degree and goal. Interpretation of a dream about a white horse by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a horse in all its shapes and colors It denotes dignity, prestige, prestige, strength, and prestige. Whoever sees a horse in a dream, this indicates his ability to overcome all obstacles and difficulties, obtain what he wants, and achieve goals. If the dreamer sees that he is riding a white horse and running with it, this symbolizes many changes, and moving from one place to another. And getting rid of a complicated matter, and enjoying insight and insight into the future. If someone falls from his horse, this means removal from the position or a major loss and reversal of circumstances. If a person sees a deficiency in his horse, this indicates an inherent deficiency in his personality and nature. Also, seeing riding a horse White also expresses marriage in the near future and the formation of a partnership with a woman who will help him in life’s problems and be a support for him in crises. If the dreamer sees that he is in a race with a horse, this indicates a difficult battle in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a white horse by Imam al-SadiqImam Jaafar al-Sadiq is considered a white horse A symbol of blessing, honor, skill, strength, and adornment, according to the Almighty’s saying: “And horses, mules, and donkeys for riding and adornment.” This vision also indicates battles and wars that the dreamer decides and his will triumphs in. If he sees that he is riding his horse, this explains his wife and his relationship with her. If he sees a horse turning against him or quarreling. With him, this symbolizes the slave’s disobedience to him, the wife’s disobedience, or facing many disagreements and difficulties in life. But if you see the horse

title: The most important interpretations of seeing money in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream: Seeing money is considered one of the visions in which there is great controversy among jurists, between hating it and considering it a praiseworthy vision, and this controversy arises from the consequences of the value of money and what it does to the souls of some. This vision has many connotations that differ depending on the considerations. What concerns us in this article is that we look at all the special cases and signals for seeing money in a dream, taking into account that money can be metal, paper, or gold and can be found on the road, among the dirt. . , or in a bag. The most important interpretations of seeing money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing money in a dream indicates remarkable growth and progress and a period full of news that will change the fortuneteller’s situation for the better. He will rise to a prominent position and enjoy many powers. This vision also indicates the psychological and moral state. For a person, he was exposed to severe distress that negatively affected his psyche and morale and he lost the ability to continue the path he recently took. With regard to the interpretation of finding money in a dream, this vision indicates that there is an opportunity for the pioneer, if he is able to use it optimally, to achieve many of his goals. Planned in advance. Seeing a person finding money in a dream may be an indication of offers made for a project and project that, if one finds the will to implement, one can manage his affairs, compensate for his previous losses and regain his rights to what was stolen from him in the past. On the other hand, This vision indicates divergent roads, loss of the ability to concentrate, distraction and randomness in life, poor evaluation of things around him, and frustration that negatively affects his decisions. In general, the vision of finding money in a dream indicates sharp changes and continuous movements in circumstances and situations, From one situation to another, from one situation to another and from one social situation to another. Searching for money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the vision of money that this vision indicates disagreements, conflicts, gossip, bad conversations, delving into honors, bragging about fleeting things, and forgetting personal duties and obligations. This vision indicates disputes and disagreements between people, entering into deep and useless discussions, and having to express an opinion in a dispute aimed at sowing doubt, confusing right and wrong, and undermining trust. However, if someone sees that he has found money, this expresses his determination to take the same action. Decisions, following the same path, using the same solutions that did not give him the desired result in the past and not listening to his advice. This vision also expresses the anxiety and pain that gradually approaches him as he approaches it, and the many problems that he will suddenly face without being able to emerge from them with victories, even if It was temporary. According to the money he finds, his worries and troubles will increase. If he finds a lot of money, his worries and crises will multiply, and if it is little, his troubles and sorrows will decrease. In short, this vision is an indication of rural satisfaction.

title: Interpretation of a dream about fire at a wedding in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a fire at a wedding party in a dream has many interpretations, so in the following lines we present the interpretation of a dream about a fire at a wedding party in a dream and other details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about fire at a wedding party in a dreamThe interpretation of a dream about fire at a wedding party in a dream can be A sign of judgments, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. However, seeing fire coming out of a marriage can be a sign that you will be freed from problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see the fire being extinguished in marriage, it may be a sign of liberation from evil, God willing. If a married man sees himself extinguishing the fire in marriage In a dream, this may indicate good changes, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about lighting a fire in an oven in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a fire in an oven in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a burning fire in the oven, this may lead to anxiety, and God knows the unseen. When a man sees If the dreamer sees a fire in the oven in a dream, this may indicate that there is a problem, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees half of his face burning in a dream, this may lead to injustice, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees half of his face burning, this may indicate injustice to others, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees half of her face burning, this may be a sign of hypocrisy, and she must You repent, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone burning in front of me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone burning in front of me in a dream could indicate the problems he faces, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing someone burning in front of me may mean anxiety, and God knows best. Also, seeing someone burning could indicate committing sins, and God is Most High. And I know that if a young man sees someone burning in a dream, it may be a sign of a prestigious position, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of burning tea in a dream. While Some scholars have reported that seeing a burning may indicate good news, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees her chest burned in a dream, this may be evidence of delaying marriage, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a burning throat, it may indicate bad friends and you should stay away from them, and God knows best. It can also express the dreamer’s warning to stay away from bad deeds, and God knows best. The highest and most knowledgeable interpretation of a dream of burning a leg in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about running on hands and feet in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about running with arms and legs in a dream In case you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about running with arms and legs in a dream, it is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are a number of interpretations. The site clarifies, citing the interpretations of some diligent scholars who seek to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about running on hands and feet in A dream: Anyone who sees in his dream that he was running with his arms and legs may indicate his extreme fear of certain things. Seeing him running on his hands and feet in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is afraid of the things surrounding him at that time and needs to ask God for help. Seeing running On the hands and feet, it could indicate escaping from daily problems in his life at that time, and God knows best. To see yourself running with your arms and legs in a dream may indicate some uncomfortable conversations that happen to the dreamer during his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of running To the mosque in a dream: Anyone who dreams of running to the mosque can indicate the dreamer’s repentance. Seeing yourself running to the mosque in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is approaching God, Blessed and Almighty, by the grace of God. If one sees that he was running to the mosque in a dream, he may This indicates the great benefit that the dreamer obtains during this period. If one sees that he was running to the mosque, this may indicate the happiness of the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running and not reaching the dream: Anyone who dreams that he was running without stopping can Not reaching his destination may indicate some obstacles and problems that the dreamer faces in your life during those days. Seeing yourself running and not arriving in a dream could indicate difficulties that the dreamer faces on his way and not moving forward. Seeing running and not achieving it in a dream may indicate It means that the dreamer will fall into some financial problems and must ask God for help. Seeing running and not arriving in the dream may indicate unhappy events that will happen to the dreamer in his life at that time. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from fire in a dream in the case of his personal opinion that he was escaping from Fire, this could indicate that the dreamer has faced some difficulties in his life and he must seek help from God. In the event that a person sees that he is running from fire, this paragraph may indicate some problems and problems that the dreamer faces in his life. Seeing yourself running from fire In a dream, it may indicate some fears and stress that the dreamer is dealing with at that time and needs to ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from the government in a dream: In the event that someone regrets that he is escaping from the police, this may indicate a lot of good things that It comes to the dreamer on those days. Escaping from the police in a dream can indicate great livelihood and positive changes that the dreamer experiences in your life during this time. If someone sees that he has escaped from authority, this may indicate that he has gone from the wrong path And he did the right things at Hill
